text: Mati kɨ faragha Samarian nguibar ekiam ko Atrivim Ahap uan adarazi ko me gamizɨ moghɨn, kɨ arazir kamra Jerusalem damuam. Kɨ bar Jerusalem gasɨghasigh egh an gumazamiziba bar me gasɨghasigham. Eghtɨ Jerusalem mati itarim, me a ruegha gɨvazɨ, mɨnezir muziarir taba an itir puvatɨzɨ moghɨn a pura ikiam.
